title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.15 - Location of sales
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.15 - Location of sales

State Regulations

The sale of lottery tickets shall be made only pursuant
to a lottery sales agent's license at the specific location named therein or at
such other locations as the commission may approve. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5001.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
